meanings.sent1: I bought some gentle cleansers for my sensitive skin.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various cleansers for different surfaces.
meanings.sent3: The cleansers in the kitchen were on strike, demanding better working conditions.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a cleanser, washing away all worries.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the cleansers filled the room, making it feel fresh and clean.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that cleans.
meanings.sent1: The professional cleansers arrived early to tidy up the house.
meanings.sent2: Robots are efficient cleansers in factories.
meanings.sent3: The little robot cleansers danced around the room, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a cleanser for the soul, bringing comfort to all.
meanings.sent5: The cleansers worked tirelessly to keep the city streets free of litter.
